scripts.start:local: node scripts/ionic-reset.js local browser && ionic serve --enableLint true
scripts.start:debug: node scripts/ionic-reset.js debug browser && ionic serve --enableLint true
scripts.clean:source: npm run clear-credentials && git checkout src/index.html
scripts.preionic:assets:generate: (cordova platform add android --nosave || true) && (cordova platform add ios --nosave || true)
scripts.ionic:assets:generate: ionic cordova resources android --force && ionic cordova resources ios --force
scripts.android:run: node scripts/ionic-reset.js debug android && ionic cordova run android -lcs
scripts.android:test: node scripts/ionic-reset.js debug android && ionic cordova emulate android
scripts.android:build:debug: node scripts/ionic-reset.js debug android && node --max_old_space_size=4096 ./node_modules/.bin/ionic cordova build android --device --no-interactive --confirm
scripts.android:build:release: node scripts/ionic-reset.js release android && node --max_old_space_size=4096 ./node_modules/.bin/ionic cordova build android --prod --release --device --no-interactive --confirm
scripts.android:dist:debug: npm run android:build:debug && node scripts/copy-dist.js android debug
scripts.android:dist:release: npm run android:build:release && node scripts/copy-dist.js android release
scripts.ios:test:iphone5s: node scripts/ionic-reset.js debug ios && ionic cordova emulate ios -lcs --target='iPhone-5s'
scripts.ios:test:iphone: node scripts/ionic-reset.js debug ios && ionic cordova emulate ios -lcs --target='iPhone-7-Plus'
scripts.ios:test:iphone:10.3: node scripts/ionic-reset.js debug ios && ionic cordova emulate ios -lcs --target='iPhone-7-Plus, 10.3'
scripts.ios:test:ipad: node scripts/ionic-reset.js debug ios && ionic cordova emulate ios -lcs --target='iPad-Pro'
scripts.ios:test:ipad:10.3: node scripts/ionic-reset.js debug ios && ionic cordova emulate ios -lcs --target='iPad-Pro, 10.3'
scripts.ios:test:ipad:11.0: node scripts/ionic-reset.js debug ios && ionic cordova emulate ios -lcs --target='iPad-Pro, 11.0'
scripts.ios:run: node scripts/ionic-reset.js debug ios && ionic cordova run ios -lcs
scripts.ios:build:debug: node scripts/ionic-reset.js debug ios && node --max_old_space_size=4096 ./node_modules/.bin/ionic cordova build ios --device --no-interactive --confirm
scripts.ios:build:release: node scripts/ionic-reset.js release ios && node --max_old_space_size=4096 ./node_modules/.bin/ionic cordova build ios --prod --release --device --no-interactive --confirm
scripts.ios:dist:debug: npm run ios:build:debug && node scripts/copy-dist.js ios debug
scripts.ios:dist:release: npm run ios:build:release && node scripts/copy-dist.js ios release
scripts.browser:run: node scripts/ionic-reset.js debug browser && ionic cordova run browser -lcs
scripts.browser:build:debug: node scripts/ionic-reset.js debug browser && node --max_old_space_size=4096 ./node_modules/.bin/ionic cordova build browser --prod --release --no-interactive --confirm && npm run browser:zip
scripts.browser:build:release: node scripts/ionic-reset.js release browser && node --max_old_space_size=4096 ./node_modules/.bin/ionic cordova build browser --prod --release --no-interactive --confirm && npm run browser:zip
scripts.browser:zip: cp environments/shared/config.xml platforms/browser/www/config.xml && cd platforms/browser/www && zip -r ../package.zip .
scripts.browser:dist:debug: npm run browser:build:debug && node scripts/copy-dist.js browser debug
scripts.browser:dist:release: npm run browser:build:release && node scripts/copy-dist.js browser release
scripts.predist:all:debug: (rm -r dist/debug || true) && mkdir dist/debug && mkdir dist/debug/android && mkdir dist/debug/browser && mkdir dist/debug/ios
scripts.predist:all:release: (rm -r dist/release || true) && mkdir dist/release && mkdir dist/release/android && mkdir dist/release/browser && mkdir dist/release/ios
scripts.dist:all:release: npm run browser:dist:release && npm run android:dist:release && npm run ios:dist:release
scripts.predist:browser: (rm buildnotes.json || true) && (rm -r dist || true) && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/debug && mkdir dist/debug/browser && mkdir dist/release && mkdir dist/release/browser
scripts.version: npm run $npm_package_config_version_build_script && npm run clean:source && git add -A config.xml
